slide_content_0: Rec Room is an MMO and also classified as a "Collectible" game. The collectibles aren't related to any achievements and revolve around clothing for your avatar. I think the game could be classified as a Social game, more than anything, and also a sandbox. I say sandbox due to the ability to create your own rooms/games. I say Social because it is the primary function of the game. I believe it is built around the ability to communicate with people, friends or strangers, and play games with them if you choose.
slide_title_1: #1: How to Start a Rec Room
slide_content_1: You will begin in a dormitory and can earn most of the achievements there. A few will require contact with other players and the final 2, the longest 2, will require gaining experience. Experience and level don't affect the gameplay much and only really add to your clothing collection since you get a free piece of clothing every time you level up. Levelling up is scaled so each level takes longer and this is the reason that the game is 200+ hours to complete. I can't say I like the game. I can't say I dislike the game. I do like that it is free and I also liked playing a few of the feature game rooms they have but those get old really fast. I don't like the constant updates and especially the updates that break the game. The company is fast to fix any errors and that is a strong positive. For all the reasons I just mentioned I would recommend the game for achievements but wouldn't recommend it to a regular gamer.
slide_title_2: #2: How to Hints and Tips Controls
slide_content_2: Controls: For the controls, I would normally put a list here of what each button does but most are useless in the game. The WT will instruct you on how to do each step, what buttons to push and what not so here I just want to inform you that the triggers/bumpers are your primary buttons in the game since they control your hands. For the most part, it just waves your hands around. Some games will allow you to use weapons or items but these are also using the triggers/bumpers. cn_A always makes you jump, from what I can tell.
slide_title_3: #3: How to Unlock the Security Door Puzzle
slide_content_3: To level up just go to the ^RecCenter, flip the controller upside down and lean it slightly on the cn_RS to spin in a circle. I found this far less damaging to a controller compared to using an elastic band. If you have an old/damaged controller already then just use that and apply said elastic band.
slide_content_4: A lot of times, hair is one of the main ways people express themselves or their culture. In Rec Room, we want you to be able to see yourself in your avatar, so we have added a bunch of new hairstyles for a broader range of options! The new hairstyles include Afro Puffs, Box Braids with Cuff, Box Braid, Braided Bun, Curly Bob, Etched Flattop, Etched Fade, Short Curly Twists, Wavy Middle Part, Short Locs, Wolf Cut!All new hairstyles are default unlocked, so you can enjoy them right away - whether you are a new player or a returning one! Just go to your mirror to customize!
slide_content_5: The following interactions can now be enabled or disabled on a per-object basis for players with specific roles: Basic Interactions: grabbing, climbing, clambering, wall running. Pushing buttons & toggle buttons. Interacting with Pool Tables, including setting the game mode and playing shots. Drawing on the art canvas, poster, and other similar surfaces.
slide_title_6: #6: How to Curse of the Crimson Cauldron
slide_content_6: Curse of the Crimson Cauldron Featuring weird dancing trolls with mighty cannons. Easily one of the most action-packed Rec Room quests. Stay back and snipe the enemies with your bow or go up close and personal with a boom with the explosive stick. My favorite combination is the shield and crossbow. Protect yourself from any potential bombs. At the end of the level is the most interesting thing I have seen in VR. All the trolls have grenade launchers and dance around the fire trying to murder you. It’s super fun. I wish Rec room would implement a better movement system for high action paced moments.
slide_title_7: #7: Where to Find All of Rita’s Secret Items?
slide_content_7: Rita is one of the main characters in the game, she is also the main character in the Tohka cartoon. She is one of the first characters to appear in Tohka’s world. She is in the game Toca Life City. Rita lives in Bob City in the first apartment in a multi-story building, which you get into at the start of the game. Rita is a girl with blue hair. Telephone. In order to start the search for Rita’s items, you need to give the girl a yellow joystick (it is in her apartment), and then move Rita to the lower panel of heroes. After you leave the heroine’s apartment, you will need to take one more thing. The item is in the theater in the dressing room, backstage. You need to take a green gem. It lies in a box on a table by the mirror in the lower left corner. Before taking the stone, you need to remove Rita from the hero panel, and only after that give the girl a gem in her hand. After placing the stone in your hand, move Rita back to the panel Pillow. After that, you can go to the HUS store. Going to the store, you need to get Rita from the hero panel. On the shelf with pillows you can find the girl’s pillow. It has an identical print with the heroine’s jacket (red with white plus signs). Rita’s pillow lies at the bottom of the center pillow stack.Pullover. You can find the next item in the Hospital on the 2nd floor. After you go to the location, you need to go left to the very end of the corridor, where several chambers are equipped. On a pink chair by the window, Rita’s jacket with plaster of paris will lie in a pile.
slide_title_8: #8: Tips for Finding New Year’s Gifts
slide_content_8: Dump. The first place you can go is the Pet Dump, which is located next to the Garage. In one of the storage boxes, you can find a lot of New Year’s things. Open several boxes to collect all the items in the Junkyard. Here you can put together a complete herringbone costume and come up with an interesting story with it. One of the boxes will contain antlers and a hat with a Santa Claus pompom. In addition to costumes, you can also find Christmas decorations and toys at the Garbage. We advise you to explore all the boxes to find more holiday items. Mail. The next building in Bob City where you should go for New Year’s items is the Post Office. Going deeper into the hall, you can see vertical shelves - this is a storage (archive) of forgotten things. We advise you to flip the shelves up until the holiday items appear. Keep in mind that items can be on multiple shelves, so flip through them all. Basically, in the post office you can get a variety of fireworks and Christmas-themed toys. Farm. For even more New Year’s items, head to the Farm location to the store with a horse’s head flaunting above. All over the shop you will find various items, you can find among them Christmas gifts, interesting decorations and toys. The picture above shows the location in the shop where you can find gifts and boxes with holiday items.
slide_content_9: Crumpets are tiny pets that you can have at home. They have appeared throughout the Toca Life games, hiding in trees or under manhole covers. Pets come in a wide variety of species and appearances, and each species belongs to the area in which it is found. But to get them, you should look carefully. We’ll give you some tips on where to find your pets. The search is done by the standard hero Nari: Take Nari to the warehouse and give her a slice of pizza (available at the Mall) and a rose (found at the barber shop) to get Midge’s pet. Then take Nari to the Vault and give her the Poop figurine (found in the Apartment) and toilet paper (found in the Mall in the main world) to get the Poop pet. Take Nari to the Vault and give her the Green Band magazine and baguette to get the pet with the pencil. You will also receive the animal with the help of a photo of a lady with glasses from the Quarter and a "bigger flower" from the mail. The purple octopus and the "taller mail flower" will give you another creature. .
slide_title_10: How to get the jet pack alien suit in Wobbly Life
slide_content_10: How get the jet pack // alien suit? 1) You need to start pizza job after 12am (only this hour) 2)Afrer this job starts w/o timer and UFO will appear. 3)All you have to do just follow the damn UFO and deliver pizza to aliens 4)Once thats been completed you'll unlock the alien outfit that will have the jetpack How to equippe suit? You can equippe suit in in each cupboard marked on the map Congratulations! Now you can fly and be green guy like crazy frog 👽
slide_title_11: How To Get Toxic Waste Car
slide_content_11: The Toxic Waste Car is found in Gooey Louie\'s home inside one of the powerplant\'s chimneys. While the Waste Disposal job is in progress Louie moves to the feeding point at the quarry, revealing a small pile of barrels. Interact with them to unlock it.
slide_content_12: Each part is found in a chest within the Temple Puzzles. The first is in the chest immediately on the left in the room the player enters after the hidden path puzzle. The second is down the left path of the maze in a dead end. The third is the opposite side of the memory pattern puzzle room from which the player enters.
slide_content_13: Take the glowing orb from the Temple Puzzles back out the start and the glowing orb from the Waterfall Puzzles into the Mining job. Behind an ore block down in the tunnels are pedestals to put both orbs. The game remembers when one is placed and when the door opens it remains open. Inside the room is a gravestone that must be put through the processor and carted away before the job timer runs out. This then unlocks the pet for purchase.
slide_content_14: Inside the Mountain Lab while small in the Shrinking Machine Lab find all the missing scientists around the room and the UFO key. Complete the middle table platforming. Zipline from the middle table to the lazer maze table and reach the other side. Complete the plank and nail platforming and reach the computer table. Complete the computer puzzle and ride the robot arm to the where the UFO key is.
